title: procurement departments
extract: The Procurement Department is the entity within both Authorities authorized to issue Invitations to Bid, Requests for Proposal, Requests for Quotation and issue contracts. The Procurement Department issues purchase orders, develops term contracts, and acquires supplies and services.
extract_html: The Procurement Department is the entity within both Authorities authorized to issue Invitations to Bid, Requests for Proposal, Requests for Quotation and issue contracts. The Procurement Department issues purchase orders, develops term contracts, and acquires supplies and services.
